column4: Latest;Siem Reap: The father of a 2 year old girl who was ------eaten by crocodiles------ on the family farm has decided to sell the animals.------The sale of the crocodile is due to him and his family of relatives suffering from regret
column5: and not wanting to such a tragedy to happen again.------ The girl
column8: was living in Pou Banteayrey Village
column10: the first daughter of her parents.------Before the incident
